Plot: The inspiration for the Sci Fi channel television series In Chicago, someone has been killing practitioners of magic, those incapable of becoming full-fledged wizards. Shockingly, all the evidence points to Harry Dresden's half-brother, Thomas, as the murderer. Determined to clear his sibling's name, Harry uncovers a conspiracy within the White Council of Wizards that threatens not only him, but his nearest and dearest, too...
Characters: Thomas Raith, Molly Carpenter, Bob (Dresden Files), Elaine Mallory, Lasciel, "Gentleman" John Marcone, Lara Raith, Karrin Murphy, Carlos Ramirez, Harry Dresden
